resources.string:
Smartphone sensors can leak information, and it can be obtained by any app without permissions in Android and thus invading privacy.
 This is a vulnerability which can be exploited by a side-channel attack.
 Our Final Year Project aims at establishing a proof-of-concept that an information being typed by the user on a smartphone can be illegitimately inferred from the smartphone motion while being typed.
 Kindly help us by providing sample data. We collect Keypresses, Accelerometer and Gyroscope readings while you type in this app. By clicking next, you agree to let us collect Keypresses, Accelerometer and Gyroscope readings (Only while you type in this app).

Hold your phone in your left hand and tap the keys using your right hand\'s index finger. Prefer an erect sitting posture and remain seated throughout the course of typing. Avoid sudden movements. Type the sentence as shown on screen including periods. The characters you type are not shown on the screen, just keep typing. In case of typo, Continue typing from next character without using backspace. (Only make sure you press the period key at end of each sentence). Thanks in advance !!!!
